name: wispr-flow-dictionary
title: Wispr Flow Dictionary
description: Manage your Wispr Flow custom vocabulary - add, view, search, and delete words
author: christi4nity

commands.name: add-word
commands.title: Add Word to Wispr Flow
commands.description: Add a new word or phrase to your Wispr Flow dictionary

commands.name: list-words
commands.title: Manage Wispr Flow Dictionary
commands.description: View, search, and delete words from your Wispr Flow dictionary

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
